gabrielle.description: Only have 30 minutes. Here are the things that you should consider: colors based on environments, desktop+mobile. Definitely will be used in dashboards & great for indicating things in realtime (1 new message) while doing something else.

Steps to success

1. Research HiFi
2. Spec out & make sure color works for all 3. Jeselle -> HiFi while Gabrielle creates barebones directive. Bonus for doing something new/above and beyond

jason.description:
1. Go to admin side bar > and click 'components'. Only 'prepared' components (i have already made sure they should work) + states are here. Let's test all the states.

2. Go to #/build/ & select component from dropdown & start testing each one indi
